structure.unit: B KENTUCKY PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION INFRASTRUCTURE AUTHORITY

text.section: Each project, upon completion, shall continuously constitute a link between parts of the highway system of the Commonwealth, or between the Commonwealth and the state of Indiana, and shall always be open to public travel, subject to any tolls or restrictions established by the developing authority. All projects shall be subject to evaluation and inspection by the department, and shall meet the standards for public roadways established by the department.
Projects may be developed in coordination with existing and proposed public transit systems.

law.history: Created 2009 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 83, effective June 26, 2009.
